statements: SELECT * FROM UserCredentials;
SELECT username, email FROM UserCredentials;
SELECT password, username, email FROM UserCredentials;
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT email FROM UserCredentials WHERE username='jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT email FROM UserCredentials WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM UserCredentials WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UserCredentials;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, session_token FROM user_sessions ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password = 'secret';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username AS user_name, session_token FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.id = user_sessions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT role_id, description FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name='admin';
SELECT u.username, r.description FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 5;
SELECT username, login_time FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, sessions.login_time, sessions.logout_time FROM users LEFT JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE sessions.logout_time IS NULL;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, sessions.login_time FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin'
SELECT u.username, COUNT(la.attempt_id) AS total_attempts FROM users u LEFT JOIN login_attempts la ON u.user_id = la.user_id GROUP BY u.username

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, pr.request_time FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN password_reset_requests pr ON u.user_id = pr.user_id ORDER BY pr.request_time DESC
